programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Três Ladrões e Um Bebê, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Para o compulsivo jogador de Slipper (Jackie Chan), existe apenas uma coisa mais aterrorizante do que os credores - o som do choro de um bebê. Mas e se um bebê se transforma-se no salvador de suas dívidas?

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Bodyguard - Resgate de Risco, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um especialista em artes marciais entra para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um rico homem de negócios. A empresa de segurança, propriedade de um velho amigo do combatente, esconde um plano de poder obscuro.

programme.title: The Ladies Man, (1961, Comedy)
programme.desc: After being jilted by his gal, Herbert swears off romance and is determined to live his life as a confirmed bachelor. However, he then finds employment at a Hollywood boardinghouse for women, and the female residents go wild over the new help!

programme.title: Roman Holiday, (1953, Romance)
programme.desc: Audrey Hepburn's portrayal of a modern-day princess, rebelling against the royal obligations, who explores Rome on her own. This romantic comedy ranks as one of the most enjoyable films of all times.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: Bogie and Holden are the mega-rich Larrabee brothers of Long Island. Bogie’s all work, Holden’s all playboy. But when Sabrina (Hepburn), daughter of the family’s chauffeur, returns from Paris, the stage is set for some family fireworks.

programme.title: The Grass Is Greener, (1960, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Victor and Hillary are down on their luck to the point that they allow tourists to take guided tours of their castle. But when a millionaire oil tycoon, visits, and takes a liking to more than the house, they soon get involved in a love triangle.

programme.title: Ladybug Ladybug, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: 1962. The routines of an elementary school are thrown into a panic when the civil defense alarms warn them of an imminent nuclear attack. Not knowing if the alarms are real, the teachers and students prepare for the unthinkable…nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: Elmer Gantry, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: A Best Actor Oscar went to Burt Lancaster for his outstanding performance as a con-man-turned-preacher in this provocative indictment of religious corruption.

programme.title: Ten Seconds to Hell, (1959, War)
programme.desc: In this gritty WW II classic from director Robert Aldrich, Jeff Chandler and Jack Palance star as demolition experts who return to bombed-out Berlin to accept the very dangerous job of defusing unexploded bombs scattered throughout the city.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima, (1950, War)
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Takers, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: After pulling off a spectacular series of bank heists, the TAKERS plan a once-in-a-lifetime job with a $25 million payoff. And all that stands in their way is a cop hell-bent on doing whatever it takes to solve the case and bring them down.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose, (2005, Horror)

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: Pet, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A young waitress engages in psychological warfare with the lonely man who abducts her, revealing the darkness lurking in each of them.

programme.title: Christine, (1983, Horror)

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Koichi Hirose (Reverb)
programme.desc: On his way to school, Koichi finds himself blackmailed by a man named Tamami Kobayashi, who frames him for running over a cat. A panicked Koichi starts to feel guilty for his actions when suddenly a giant lock appears on his chest!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon chooses the challenge where the person whose candle goes out first loses, but finds his candle has been tampered with

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.sub-title: The Trick x To x The Trick

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: With the score at 2 wins, 2 losses, the final do-or-die match is entrusted to Killua.
programme.sub-title: Trouble x With x The Gamble

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The five must vote and decide by majority rule on which path to take out of two.
programme.sub-title: Final x Test Of x Resolve

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Recap Episode.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The participants head for Zevil Island, the site of the Fourth Phase.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon bides his time for the perfect opportunity to steal Hisoka's tag.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika and Leorio are targeted by Hisoka, but they negotiate a truce.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon, Leorio and Kurapika come up with a strategy to take the tag from Ponzu, Leorio's target.
programme.sub-title: Trap x In x The Hole

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends are surrounded by vipers inside a cave with no way out.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon goes up against Hanzo who easily overpowers him, but Gon refuses to surrender.
programme.sub-title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon wakes up in the infirmary and finds out he passed the exam.
programme.sub-title: Baffling Turn x Of x Events

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal

programme.title: Death Note: Abduction

programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu come across an Italian restaurant owned by an Italian chef named Tonio. When Okuyasu asks for the menu, Tonio explains that he decides the menu on the spot based on the customer he sees.
programme.sub-title: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 1
programme.desc: Chili Pepper suddenly appears before Josuke to test his Stand powers. Josuke puts up a fight but is overwhelmed by Chili Pepper’s power. The next day, Josuke and friends learn from Jotaro that a man who can locate Chili Pepper is heading to Morioh

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and his friends gather at the Port to try and reach Joseph Joestar before Chili Pepper. Speculating the enemy is hiding nearby, Jotaro orders Josuke and Koichi to stay behind and find Chili Pepper’s user while he and Okuyasu go protect Joseph.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: We Picked Up Something Crazy!

programme.desc: Koichi and Hazamada visit the home of Rohan Kishibe, a popular manga artist whom they are huge fans of. Much to their joy, Rohan not only agrees to sign autographs but also invites them to take a tour of his workspace.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2
programme.desc: Koichi is drawn back to Rohan’s house, where he sees the manga artist finishing up his next manga at an incredible speed. Rohan uses his stand Heaven’s Door on Koichi again to gain further creative inspiration from the young boy’s life experience.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go Hunting!
programme.desc: Jotaro and Josuke must hunt down a rat that is believed to have become a Stand user after being shot by the bow and arrow. When the two arrive at the site, they find dozens of dead rats killed in the most bizarre fashion.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience

programme.title: Death Note: Father

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon decides to go to Kukuroo Mountain to bring Killua back.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Determined to see Killua, Gon and the others say that they are Killua's friends, and ask the guard to relay that message...

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: The Brothers, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: THE BROTHERS is a fresh and hilarious look at four African-American "brothers" lifelong friends who band together to navigate through the turbulent waters of love and sex on their way to healthy, happy and committed relationships. Rated R

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Bloodfist, (1989, Action)

programme.title: Bloodfist II, (1990, Action)

programme.title: Bloodfist III: Forced to Fight, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: An innocent half-Asian kickboxer (Don "The Dragon" Wilson) is caught between two other races at war in prison.

programme.title: Bloodfist VI: Ground Zero, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A kickboxer (Don "The Dragon" Wilson) must prevent the launch of a nuclear missile by terrorists targeting New York.

programme.title: Bloodfist VII: Manhunt, (1995, Action)

programme.title: Bloodfist VIII: Hard Way Out, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Kickboxing champion Jake Raye thought his fighting days were over, until a call from an old friend draws him to the Far East and into the hands of a madman.

programme.title: Legacy Of Rage [English-Language Version], (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Brandon Ma is an average Joe, but his best friend, Michael, is a sinister drug dealer with a crush on Brandon's girlfriend, May. When Michael murders a dirty cop and frames his friend, sending him to jail, Brandon returns for vengeance.

programme.title: Martial Law, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Thompson and Billie Blake are a part of the L.A.P.D.'s new program called 'Martial Law'. When they begin to tangle with criminal and kung fu master Dalton Rhodes, it becomes personal...

programme.title: Martial Law II: Undercover, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Two undercover cops investigating a murder uncover a deadly ring of corruption at a nightclub where the rich are entertained by seductive women and protected by martial arts experts.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Screwball)

programme.title: The Cable Guy, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)

programme.title: Who's Harry Crumb?, (1989, Comedy)

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)

programme.title: Friends with Benefits, (2011, Romance)

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game, (2001, Romance)

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Drama)

programme.title: Legends of the Fall, (1994, Drama)

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Drama)

programme.desc: Adapted from William Shakespeare, the film tells the story of two couples, confirmed bachelor Benedick and caustic Beatrice, and young Claudio and innocent Hero. Playful bickering defines one couple, whereas romance and betrayal describe the other.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)

programme.title: Obsessed, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: Successful financial advisor Derek Charles’ life seems perfect. But when a beautiful temp, Lisa, joins the firm, Derek's life takes a strange turn. After a misunderstood encounter at the company holiday party, Lisa begins to spiral out of control.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Texas Killing Fields, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective (Worthington) teams up with a cop from New York City (Morgan) to investigate a series of unsolved murders. Based on true events.

programme.title: The Vanished, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: A family vacation takes a terrifying turn when a couple's young daughter disappears without a trace. As the list of suspects grows, the search for the truth leads to a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Valkyrie, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: In WWII, a group of German officers plots to assassinate Hitler and seize control of the military command to end the war. The operation was codenamed "Valkyrie", for the plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross, (1992, Drama)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)

programme.title: Noah, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. "This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After his uncle dies, a young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited to be undercover himself. Based on the novel by Anthony Horowitz.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Horror)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Downhill Racer, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: An ambitious American Skier gains a place on the team competing in Europe.

programme.title: I Think We're Alone Now, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The carefully crafted paradise of the last man on Earth is threatened by the arrival of a mysterious interloper.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Vampire's Kiss, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Teetering on the edge of sanity, volatile literary agent Peter Loew (Nicolas Cage) tries to find purpose in his life through a cutthroat work ethic and a hedonistic nightlife.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Man Who Fell To Earth, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Thomas Jerome Newton (David Bowie) is a humanoid alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet. He starts a high technology company to get the billions of dollars he needs to build a return spacecraft.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Still Smokin, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: It's Cheech and Chong at their wildest, craziest, most medicated, doing all those zonked-out characters and hilarious routines that put them where they are today: out of the country.

programme.title: Hair, (1979, Musical)
programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Cell, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Cusack and Samuel L. Jackson star in this mind-blowing thriller based on the novel by Stephen King about a cell phone signal that triggers apocalyptic terror.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious comet turns every machine on Earth into a homicidal rampage device, the survivors at the Dixie Boy Truck Stop are making a stand, and human vengeance goes into overdrive.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby, (1968, Horror)
programme.desc: The story of a young couple who are expecting their first child. Like most first-time mothers, Rosemary experiences confusion. Her husband, an ambitious but unsuccessful actor, makes a pact with the devil that promises to send his career skyward.

programme.title: Scrooged, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Frank Cross is a mean TV executive with perfect qualities of a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over, he'll be visited by three ghosts from the past, present and future.

programme.title: Ghostbusters, (1984, Screwball)
programme.desc: A trio of university parasychologists lose their research grant and decide to open their own business, "Ghostbusters," and almost at once are summoned to investigate the strange happenings in a Central Park West apartment.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II, (1989, Screwball)
programme.desc: Directed by Ivan Reitman. Starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis, Annie Potts. The ghostbusters attempt to rid New York City from the slime and negative energy that plagues it.

programme.title: Scrooged, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Frank Cross is a mean TV executive with perfect qualities of a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over, he'll be visited by three ghosts from the past, present and future.

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.title: Big Top Pee-Wee, (1987, Screwball)
programme.desc: In Big Top Pee-Wee, I live on a country farm where I feed my barnyard animals pancake breakfasts and work on top-secret botanical experiments with my pet pig, Vance.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II, (1988, Screwball)
programme.desc: Just as the eccentric Australian is starting to adjust to life in New York City, Dundee and his beautiful girlfriend (Linda Kozlowski) are targeted for death by a gang of ruthless drug dealers.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners (1999), (1998, Screwball)
programme.desc: A Neil Simon comedy that follows a couple's mishaps as they travel to New York for a job interview. A series of comedic disasters follow that might make one think twice before visiting the Big Apple.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.

programme.title: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!

programme.title: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.

programme.title: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star. The team suspects that is an inside job because the ninja who took the star used the ninja art, Kujaku, from the Star Village.

programme.title: Akahoshi, the masked ninja who kidnapped Sumaru, intends to use Sumaru to call out the mysterious ninja who stole the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The masked ninja and Naruto fall into the depths of the Valley. While tending to Naruto's wounds, the masked ninja tells him the reason for stealing the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Natsuhi's body is reacting to the effects of the star. She wields the star and desperately confronts Akahoshi, but Sumaru is taken as hostage
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sumaru senses his mother's death and Naruto is unable to stop an angry Sumaru from running off. To save Sumaru, Hokuto and Mizura stake their lives to reveal the truth behind the star training.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru is injured by a rival shinobi from another nation. The shinobi used a battle skill that spreads bacteria throughout the opponent's body, infecting the victim's mental faculties. This causes Akamaru to go into uncontrollable rampage!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn't the legendary being known as the "Onbaa."
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An ominous black smoke appears over the Land of Greens, and all of sudden Choji and company are attacked by an unidentified Ninja!

programme.title: Naruto and the others are attacked by Ruiga, the first evil ninja, who can draw water from the earth to use as weapons.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The first lady of the Land of Honey and her entourage have disappeared. Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are sent on a mission and they discover an eerie castle looming in the middle of the road!

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Seeking revenge for his dead father, Genho, Yagura's true identity and oldest sibling of the Ryudoin Brothers confronts Guy using a unique Jutsu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto has a dream about Yakumo wishing to become a ninja and Kurenai threatens to seal her power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The assailants are members of the Kurama Clan of Hidden Leaf Village. Naruto and company rush to the villa to protect Yakumo.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: The General, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: The true story of Dublin folk hero and criminal Martin Cahill (Brendan Gleeson, "In Bruges"), who pulled off two daring robberies in Ireland that attracted worldwide attention.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime – even if it means breaking the law.

programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato’s Freedom!

programme.title: Kaido's plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!

programme.title: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy’s All-Out War Begins!

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon/
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!

programme.title: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I’ll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden’s Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won’t Forgive Him! Chopper’s Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasaki’s Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper’s Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It’s Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamato’s Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marco’s Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!

programme.title: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama’s Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji’s Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!

programme.title: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!

programme.title: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!

programme.title: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors’ Deadly Attack!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'état is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: The most towering myth of all time meets up with the mission of a real man in this action-adventure thriller that reveals the famed symbol of courage as he’s never been seen before: finding the hero’s heart that beats beneath his colossal image.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller stars as Eddie, the 40-year-old confirmed bachelor who finally says "I do" to the beautiful and Lila. But during their honeymoon, the woman of his dreams turns out to be a total nightmare.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Ghost World, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.

programme.title: Saved!, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Good girl Mary (Jena Malone) can't believe it when she gets pregnant by her newly-gay boyfriend. She also can't believe the actions of her popular, relentlessly devout best friend, Hilary Faye (Mandy Moore).

programme.title: Secrets are told and revealed; Hershel refuses to acknowledge the world's new reality; Andrea comes out of her shell; everything is food for something.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others try to restore order after a terrible discovery; Hershel takes up an old habit and disappears.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Enemies trap Rick, Hershel and Glenn, who fight to survive; when everyone realizes she is missing, Shane goes after Lori and finds her in danger.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and Shane are in conflict over the fate of an outsider; Andrea helps Hershel's daughter face a crucial decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

The Legion's large-scale offensive begins, and the Spearhead crew are sent into the thick of the fighting, but even back at base, there's no safety to be found.

In the Republic, Lena organizes a desperate last stand against the invading Legion; in the Federacy, Shin, his friends, and Frederica manage to survive the bombardment, but the Legion inflicts significant losses.
As Nordlicht prepares for their mission, Grethe successfully petitions to allow the use of the prototype ground effect airplane "Nachzehrer;" Grethe volunteers to be the pilot.

As the Nachzehrer nears the Morpho, it comes under anti-air attack; Nordlicht fights its way through the Legion defenders and approaches the Morpho, only for Shin to realize that the damaged Morpho is bait for a trap.
Deep in enemy territory, with supplies running low and damage piling up, Nordlicht makes a final desperate march towards Morpho.
The members of Nordlicht drop out one by one in the face of the Legion's onslaught, and Shin faces the Morpho alone.
